modeDescriptions.help: Get help and support for mental health issues
modeDescriptions.tips: Receive daily tips to improve your mental wellbeing
modeDescriptions.chat: Chat freely about anything on your mind

speechMode.title: AI Voice Counselor
speechMode.pressToStart: Press the microphone button to start speaking
speechMode.instruction: Press the microphone button to start speaking

welcome.description: I am an AI Counselor ready to listen and help you. All conversations are confidential.

anxious.label: I'm feeling anxious...
anxious.message: I'm feeling anxious and don't know what to do. Can you help me?

sad.label: I'm sad today
sad.message: I'm feeling sad today and need someone to talk to.

tips.label: Tips for stress
tips.message: Can you give me some tips to manage stress?

chat.label: I want to share
chat.message: I want to share what's on my mind today.

assessment.availableDescription: Based on our conversation, I can help you with a structured assessment for
assessment.question: Question

structuredAvailable.title: Structured Assessment Available
structuredAvailable.description: Based on our conversation, I can help you with a structured assessment for

assessment.exitConfirm: Are you sure you want to exit the assessment?

input.assessmentPlaceholder: Share your thoughts about this question...
input.helpPlaceholder: How are you feeling today? I'm here to listen...

supportive.howFeeling: How are you feeling right now?

prompts.feelings: How are you feeling right now?
prompts.today: What happened today that brought you here?
prompts.support: What kind of support do you need most?
prompts.general2: How does that make you feel?
prompts.general3: What would help you right now?

responses.happy3: I want to share my joy.
responses.sad3: I need someone to talk to.
responses.anxious1: I can't stop worrying about things.
responses.anxious2: My mind is racing with thoughts.
responses.anxious3: I feel like something bad will happen.

exit.confirm: Are you sure you want to exit? Your progress will be saved.
